2. Show the Database Explorer Viewer, Then start and end the wizard.
3. Create new connection in another Database Explorer Viewer. it can't work. no error message.

Because the root cause is the NPE in WTP. The view of Database Explorer could be malfunction once another Database Explorer View disposed. 
The root cause is: there are two database explorer vievers, once the viewer dispose,  its viewer dispose().
ServerExplorerViewer, it is a CommonViewer, 
when CommonViewer dispose()
CommonViewer.dispose will call NavigatorContentService.dispose()
-->
NavigatorContentDescriptorInstance.dispose()
-->
ProxyContentExtension.dispose()
-->
DefaultNavigatorContentExtension.dispose()
-->
NavigatorContentProvider.dispose()
-->
ServerExplorerContentProviderNav.dispose()
and the ServerExplorerContentProviderNav.dispose() will call 
ServerExplorerManager.INSTANCE.setServerExplorerService(null)

ServerExplorerManager.INSTANCE is a static member variable.
This variable is also used by another viewer, which defined in perspective, 
Then the NullPointerException is thrown.

It is not forbiden to create another Database Explorer Viewer. so I think it is a bug of WTP.
